name: InfinityWarFacts
0:
”Alexa, Open Infinity War Facts”
”Alexa, Launch Infinity War Facts”
”Alexa, Start Infinity War Facts”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: infinity war facts
des: Just ask Alexa, "Open Infinity War Facts". It will generate a random fact about Infinity War and tell you. This skill is for any and every Marvel cinematic fan. It will tell you all you need to know for Infinity Wars. Have fun and learn something about the blockbuster movie you didn't already know.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
